import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { Segment, Grid, Label, Image, List, Button } from 'semantic-ui-react'; import { avatarActions } from '../../actions'; import {isEmpty} from 'lodash' class AvatarPage extends Component { async componentDidMount() { await this.props.getActiveAvatar(); } handleAvatarChange = (src) => { this.props.changeAvatar(src); } handleAvatarSubmit = () => { this.props.setActiveAvatar(this.props.userAvatar); } render() { const { userAvatar, avatarChanged }=this.props; return (

( ) : ( null )} ); } } function mapState(state) { const { userAvatar, avatarChanged } = state.avatar return { userAvatar, avatarChanged }; } const actionCreators = { changeAvatar: avatarActions.changeAvatar, getActiveAvatar: avatarActions.getActiveAvatar, setActiveAvatar: avatarActions.setActiveAvatar, }; const connectedAvatarPage = connect(mapState, actionCreators)(AvatarPage); export { connectedAvatarPage as AvatarPage };
